Reviews.Title: Horrible mounts
Reviews.Author: w earp
Reviews.Content: Cameras are great and night vision is outstanding.  The mounts are horrible.  They will not lock or support the weight of these cameras. EDIT to add: Well, there is no way to get proper mounts through Amazon or CIB without buying them separately.  I have to send these cameras back, because I don't have time to waste on finding or making new mounts.  I bought the smaller cameras with better mounts.  Return shipping was free through Amazon.  Get some good mounts and this is a great camera, range is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Good camera bad bracket.
Reviews.Author: S. Young
Reviews.Content: This is a large camera with a lot of weight. Bracket won't hold camera and broke trying to install. So far camera looks to have good night vision.Update 10/22/2013:OK, so these cameras are no longer available in single units. I ordered the 4 camera package and received 4 8795s, a far inferior product. Beware, this is the third time USA Security Store has pulled a "Bait-n-Switch" on me. Only purchase CUC cameras through Amazon for easy return. USA Security took almost 3 months to get me a return label. Dumb me, I already ordered and paid for better brackets that I can't now use.
